nodes.text: Ted Kryczko served as the executive producer for Episode IV: A New Hope Read-Along Storybook and CD.

Kryczko is the Vice President of A&R Catalog Development at Walt Disney Records. Kryczko has produced over 500 products in his time at Walt Disney Records, including The Lion King Read-Along Storyboook and CD and A Green and Red Christmas - The Muppets. He states that if he were not in the entertainment industry, he would have pursued a career as a spy or assassin.
